analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa
dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
saraṇaduka piṭṭhiduka
sa auttarapada

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saraṇo dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca saraṇaḥ dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naaraṇaṁ nanadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na araṇam na na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ na dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka

original: Nasaraṇaṁ nasauttaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na sauttaram dhammam paṭicca araṇaḥ sauttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
sahajāta vārampi paccaya vārampi nissaya vārampi sa saṭṭha vārampi sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa
pañhāvāra
hetu ārammaṇa

original: Nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo araṇassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇaḥ na sauttaraḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa sauttarassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ eka

original: Nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo araṇassa sauttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na saraṇaḥ na sauttaraḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa sauttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ eka

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe eka adhipatiyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka
paccanīya uddhāra

original: Nasaraṇo nasauttaro dhammo araṇassa sauttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo
analyzed: na saraṇaḥ na sauttaraḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa sauttarassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta paccayena paccayaḥ upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ pacchājāta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… noavigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetuyāḥ eka na ārammaṇe ekaṃ pe no avigate eka
hetu paccayāḥ na ārammaṇe eka saṅkhitta
na hetu paccayā ārammaṇe eka saṅkhitta
yathā kusala ttike pañhāvāram evam
an uttara pada
hetu anantara

original: Nasaraṇaṁ naanuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā araṇo anuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na saraṇam na anuttaram dhammam paccayā araṇaḥ anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo araṇassa anuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na saraṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa anuttarassa dhammassa anantara paccayena paccayaḥ

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Anantare ekaṁ, samanantare ekaṁ, nissaye ekaṁ, upanissaye dve, purejāte
analyzed: saṅkhitta anantare eka samanantare eka nissaye eka upanissaye dve purejāte

original: ekaṁ, āsevane ekaṁ, vippayutte ekaṁ, atthiyā ekaṁ, natthiyā ekaṁ, vigate ekaṁ, avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: eka āsevane eka vippayutte eka atthiyāḥ eka natthiyāḥ eka vigate eka avigate eka
paccanīya uddhāra

original: Nasaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo araṇassa anuttarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na saraṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa anuttarassa dhammassa upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ purejāta paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Naaraṇo naanuttaro dhammo araṇassa anuttarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na araṇaḥ na anuttaraḥ dhammaḥ araṇassa anuttarassa dhammassa upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe dve …pe… naupanissaye ekaṁ, napurejāte dve …pe… noavigate dve.
analyzed: na hetuyā dve na ārammaṇe dve pe na upanissaye eka na purejāte dve pe no avigate dve
upanissaya paccayā na hetuyā dve

original: Nahetupaccayā upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṁ …pe… atthiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu paccayā upanissaye dve purejāte ekam pe atthiyāḥ ekam pe avigate eka
yathā kusala ttike pañhāvāram evam

original: Anulomadukatikapaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā tiṁsamattehi bhāṇavārehi paṭṭhānaṁ.
analyzed: anuloma duka tika paṭṭhānataḥ paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā ti samattehi bhāṇavārehi paṭṭhāna
dhamma paccanīya anulome duka duka paṭṭhānam niṭṭhita
paccanīya anuloma paṭṭhānam niṭṭhita
paṭṭhāna pakaraṇam niṭṭhita
